notes.text:
An update is available for llvm-compat, lld, compiler-rt, module.lld, lldb, python-lit, module.python-lit, module.lldb, llvm, libomp, module.compiler-rt, clang, module.libomp, module.llvm-compat, module.llvm, module.clang.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
LLVM Toolset provides the LLVM compiler infrastructure framework, the Clang compiler for the C and C++ languages, the LLDB debugger, and related tools for code analysis.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* Rebase LLVM Toolset to LLVM 18 [rhel-8.10.0.z]  (JIRA:Rocky Linux-29882)

* Build lld for s390x [rhel-8.10.0.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-30679)

* Update LLVM Toolset to 18.1.8 [rhel-8.10.0.z] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-30907)

* LLVM bug fix for Strix [rhel-8] (JIRA:Rocky Linux-54336)

* Add -devel packages to llvm-compat (JIRA:Rocky Linux-51801)

* Move LLVM18 builds from rhel8-next stream to rhel8 (JIRA:Rocky Linux-60938)

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RLBA-2024:8828

document.title: llvm-toolset:rhel8 bug fix and enhancement update
